sentences.sContent: ...a soft but full-bodied wine with concentrated blackcurrant flavour.
sentences.sCn: ...一种不含酒精但带有浓厚的浓缩黑醋栗味道的酒。

synos.tran: 浓郁的；醇厚的；魁梧的；躯体大的

remMethod.val: full(完全的) + bodi(=body 身体) + ed(…的) → 全身都有的 → (味道)浓烈的

trans.tranCn: 魁梧的； 浓烈的； 重要的
trans.tranOther: a full-bodied wine or other drink has a pleasantly strong taste
